articles.author: Anne C. Spaulding, Ana Drobeniuc, Paula M. Frew, Tiffany L. Lemon, Emeli J. Anderson, Colin Cerwonka, Chava Bowden, John Freshley, Carlos del Rio
articles.title: Jail, an unappreciated medical home: Assessing the feasibility of a strengths-based case management intervention to improve the care retention of HIV-infected persons once released from jail
articles.description: Background Linkage to and retention in care for US persons living with HIV (PLWH) after release from jail usually declines. We know of no rigorously evaluated behavioral interventions that can improve this. We hypothesized that a strengths-based case manageme…

articles.author: USA TODAY NETWORK - Tennessee
articles.title: Here are the nonprofits receiving $2 million in grants from Community Foundation of Middle Tennessee
articles.description: The 346 organizations benefiting from the 2017 grant-making process are located in 31 of Middle Tennessee's 40 counties.

articles.author: Matthew Rettenmund
articles.title: The Queens' Messenger: A Brief History Of LGBTQ Characters, People, Mentions & Moments On (Mostly Primetime) U.S. TV — 1920s-2000
articles.description: LGBTQ people and issues — and how they've been dealt with on (mostly) U.S. television in (almost exclusively) primetime.
